channel.title: Posts on Hey, I'm Kevin

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. — Mr. Robot S01E01 Yes I am a fan of mr robot, this is just a test jaja
item.content:
“Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person.

— Mr. Robot S01E01

Yes I am a fan of mr robot, this is just a test jaja
